entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with rain early in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
